1559412214_1GDzVsFoYamHqWcYBcuvVWFCAt3Y5.body:
as sypperit said, however you can omit the <to> if you want,  as it will take the name of the file being linked without you speicifying it for eg 
ln -s /bin/ls 
will provide a link looking like this ..  ls -> /bin/ls  ('unlink ls' will remove it)
